data.name: Anna Series - Novel Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Curious to know more about the women of Series Shores? Or maybe you're just looking for a little extra about your favourite replica? Good news! Doctor Alleyne finally has you covered Volunteer!

Now available on Steam you can pick up all four original novels which Anna: The Series Test is centered around! Best part is you get all four for the price of one if your were to buy them individually! Alleyne loves to offer a bargain where she can. All books will come in a PDF format which you can find in your steam directory folder/Anna Series.

Each book directly ties into the story of The Series Test and offers a complete backstory into the snippets each replica has currently offered. In this bundle you will receive a copy of; Anna - The New Los Angeles Chapter. Anna - The Little Tokyo Chapter. Anna- Freya's Vision. Anna - Broken Machines.

A pre-warning - During the Series Test, the replicas will reference a war which happened in New Los Angeles, a fight between our beloved clones and The Mother. However this is not a story told in the novels. These books offer up the backstory and the circumstances which lead our replicas up to being in New Los Angeles for the this war, however book 5; Anna - Freya's Legacy, is on hold for the time being while I finish creating The Series Test.
Each novel is it's own complete story which then leads to this point. So each will be a full experience, just if you're purchasing the novels to read about the war itself, this isn't there. Might not have needed mentioning. Only I wanted to be transparent with you all about the novels you're receiving.



Take your first dive into where The Anna Series began by reading Anna - The New Los Angeles Chapter!

In the first ever Anna Series novel published you'll read all about Detective Kyle Atherton and Anna-57F as they sleuth their way through New Los Angeles attempting to track down a vicious killer who's been hunting Anna for sport. Yet as Kyle dives deeper into the mystery surrounding these puzzling murders he becomes ever more drawn into a larger game being played by those way above his paygrade.

Will he be able to stop the monster of New Los Angeles or will he himself lose to grand game? An officer of the law is sworn to protecting human life, but does that devotion carry through when the life taken is artificial in nature? Kyle Atherton is the man tasked with finding out, yet how much of himself will he lose in the process, and can he continue to protect the love of his life while doing so?

Anna - The New Los Angeles Chapter, delves into the origin story of our beloved Alma Way. So if Alma is ya gal, why not give it a try?



The second instalment of The Anna Series flies you over to a new city where a new story is unfolding. Anna - The Little Tokyo Chapter.

In the dead of night sirens start blazing out from Little Tokyo's maximum security male prison signaling the escape of it's most feared convict. Yet for what reason did this woman dare escape, and what does she plan to do next? Why was she locked inside a male prison to rot away to begin with?

Anna - Little Tokyo will have you following the story of the new worlds most feared assassin, Kiyomi Sasaki. Locked away for five years for a endless string of assassinations, Kiyomi Sasaki is finally free and seeking revenge against the people who locked her away. However Kiyomi's plans, and life, take a drastic change after she is fatally wounded during her escape and nursed back to health by a mysterious doctor and his blind daughter.
Now Kiyomi is tasked with doing something she's never done before, caring for a child. Is Kiyomi able to protect the family which saved her while also taking revenge on those who wronged her? Is she able to do all this while an insane machine stalks her around Little Tokyo attempting to settle it's own agenda?

Anna - The Little Tokyo Chapter dips into the origin story of both Kiyomi and Aiko. Maybe it's the Sasaki's who've taken control of your test, if so then this one is for you.



The third in The Anna Series takes a back-step in time to reveal the Anna's beginning. Anna - Freya's Vision.

Spanning over a decade, Anna Freya's vision follows a young Freya Valentina surviving the harsh wastelands of a broken world after the people she came to call family betrayed her. This story spans the evolution of Apex's empire, taking place both before the Anna's creation and after.

Freya Valentina, the smartest woman alive, is a young French girl embarking on a new career, as one of Apex's founders in the foreign lands of America. Disaster strikes for Freya though as the Arlington Virus starts ravaging the world, but it's Freya so surely be okay? Her other three founders are her new family after all, right? Betrayed, Freya is left stranded in lands she doesn't know while fleeing the very people who cared for her, problem is she has something residing in her mind Apex just refuses to give up.

Spanning a decade, follow Freya's journey as she transforms from a naive scared teen to one the most powerful woman walking the planet. Meeting friends, foes and two very opposing brothers along the way.

Anna - Freya's Vision offers you the chance to learn why and how our Freya became Freya. Height included. So if the timid giantess is your flavour, you'll love this one.



The fourth and final, for now, instalment of the Anna Series comes in two parts. Live a journey through both Aiko and Cherry in, Anna - Broken Machines.

The first half of Broken Machines explores the tale of a mute Aiko Sasaki. Hard to imagine out loveable insane princess as being one for lack of words, yet there was a time. Already featured in Little Tokyo, Aiko's origin story is never fully explored, so this is your chance. Follow Aiko's own account of what happened when she first became an Anna, who she was before she was Aiko.
You'll be returning to Little Tokyo, years before Kiyomi arrived and discovering how Aiko coped with the death of a loved one. Plus what she did after an accidental murder, several in fact, and the friends she made along the way to discovering her voice.

In the second half of Broken Machines, you'll be reading through Cherry's memoirs as she explores the eight cities in search of her mother. You ever noticed that book Cherry always keep close to her waist? In Broken Machine you'll get the chance to read it in Cherry's own words and everything. You'll be reading Cherry's emotions change as she slowly starts to lose faith in the mother she adores. You'll discover how she accidentally started a cult which tore the eight cities apart. But it's Cherry, so she's forgivable, right?

If Miss Cherry Petra Valentina is your sweet romance, or even if you prefer the violent unpredictability of Princess Sasaki, then Broken Machines is going to be your fix.


*** DISCLAIMER: THIS IS NOT A GAME. THIS DLC IS 4 SEPERATE NOVELS WHICH THE GAMES ARE BASED ON. YOU ARE BUYING PDF VERSIONS OF THESE NOVELS ONLY***
